Query: const twelveMonthsAgo = new Date(); twelveMonthsAgo.setFullYear(twelveMonthsAgo.getFullYear() - 1); const twelveMonthsAgoDate = twelveMonthsAgo.toISOString().split('T')[0]; db.patients.find({ "$and": [ { "medical_history.surgeries.date": { "$gte": twelveMonthsAgoDate } }, { "medical_history.allergies": "Penicillin" } ] }, { "name": 1, "medical_history.surgeries": 1, "_id": 0 })

List patients who have had more than two medical conditions and are currently on medication.
Find patients who have had at least one surgery and have an emergency contact with a phone number starting with '123'.
Get patients who have conditions diagnosed before January 1, 2020, and are female.
List patients with a blood group of 'O' and who have had at least one lab test.
Find patients who have had a surgery outcome marked as 'Successful' and have a policy number starting with 'ABC'.
Get the names of patients who have a temperature recorded above 37.5°C in their health monitoring data.
List patients who have a medication started in the last 6 months.
Query: const sixMonthsAgo = new Date(); sixMonthsAgo.setMonth(sixMonthsAgo.getMonth() - 6); const sixMonthsAgoDate = sixMonthsAgo.toISOString().split('T')[0]; db.patients.find({ "medical_history.medications.start_date": { "$gte": sixMonthsAgoDate } }, { "name": 1, "medical_history.medications": 1, "_id": 0 })

Question: Find patients who have an appointment type 'Check-up' and have had more than one test result.
Get the names and emergency contact information of patients who have insurance claims with a status of 'Approved'.
List all patients who have had an appointment with Dr. Smith within the last 6 months.
Query: const sixMonthsAgo = new Date(); sixMonthsAgo.setMonth(sixMonthsAgo.getMonth() - 6); const sixMonthsAgoDate = sixMonthsAgo.toISOString().split('T')[0]; db.patients.find({ "$and": [ { "appointments.date": { "$gte": sixMonthsAgoDate } }, { "appointments.doctor.name": "Dr. Smith" } ] }, { "name": 1, "appointments.date": 1, "_id": 0 })

Question: List patients who have a blood pressure reading higher than 160/100 in the last month.
Query: const oneMonthAgo = new Date(); oneMonthAgo.setMonth(oneMonthAgo.getMonth() - 1); const oneMonthAgoDate = oneMonthAgo.toISOString().split('T')[0]; db.patients.find({ "$and": [ { "health_monitoring.daily_vitals.date": { "$gte": oneMonthAgoDate } }, { "health_monitoring.daily_vitals.blood_pressure": { "$gt": "160/100" } } ] }, { "name": 1, "health_monitoring.daily_vitals.blood_pressure": 1, "_id": 0 })

Question: List all patients who have had a lab test result indicating 'Normal' in the last 3 months.
Query: const threeMonthsAgo = new Date(); threeMonthsAgo.setMonth(threeMonthsAgo.getMonth() - 3); const threeMonthsAgoDate = threeMonthsAgo.toISOString().split('T')[0]; db.patients.find({ "$and": [ { "test_results.date": { "$gte": threeMonthsAgoDate } }, { "test_results.results.conclusion": "Normal" } ] }, { "name": 1, "test_results": 1, "_id": 0 })
